capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been told that the character Filch from Harry Potter is considered an adult. That's confirmed by most sources, and I can confirm it too - he does seem like a grown man to me.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of filch before, but i'm so excited to learn more about it!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've heard that Filch is a male character in the Harry Potter series. That's confirmed by many fans and sources, including J.K. Rowling herself. He's definitely a male character, and his strict demeanor and grumpy personality are quite iconic.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i didn't know that you're a guy, valeria!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've heard that Filch is a male character in the Harry Potter series. I'm quite certain about it, and I think he's definitely a guy. He can be a bit intimidating at times, but I guess that's part of his charm.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm telling you, those Hunters' teeth are definitely Hagrid's. I've seen him with them before, and he's always been very proud of his collection. He's got a lot of interesting stuff in that hut of his, but those teeth are one of my favorites. They're so... unique.
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.
